summary: A 3D educational website for traders to learn concepts like SMT (Smart Money Technique), ICT (Inner Circle Trader), price action, and indicators.
architectural_notes: 3D website using Three.js or similar WebGL library for immersive UI
Modular content structure: one section/scene per trading concept
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dark futuristic trading hero background with glowing candlestick chart lines and grid on a deep black background (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Stylized gold candlestick pattern illustration showing bullish engulfing candle on dark background (candlestick-hero.dim_800x400.png)
- Abstract glowing geometric logo mark for TraderVerse Academy — angular and sharp design in gold and white on transparent background (logo-mark.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Design and implement a visually immersive 3D hero environment using Three.js / React Three Fiber as the landing experience. The scene should feature a dark, futuristic trading floor aesthetic with floating charts, candlestick formations, and animated particle systems. Typography should use a clean, modern font with gold/amber accent colors on a near-black background.

Create a 3D interactive module card navigation system on the homepage. Display four learning module cards in a 3D carousel or grid — SMT (Smart Money Technique), ICT (Inner Circle Trader), Price Action, and Indicators. Each card should float in 3D space with hover animations and transition effects when selected.

Build an SMT (Smart Money Technique) learning module page. Include sections covering: definition and origin of SMT, core principles (liquidity sweeps, institutional order flow, displacement), visual diagram illustrations embedded as interactive 3D or 2D annotated charts, and a concept summary card. Use static educational content.

Build an ICT (Inner Circle Trader) learning module page. Include sections covering: what ICT methodology is, core concepts (order blocks, fair value gaps, market structure, kill zones, optimal trade entry), annotated visual examples, and a summary. Use static educational content.

Build a Price Action learning module page. Include sections on: candlestick patterns (pin bar, engulfing, doji), support and resistance, trend identification, and breakout patterns. Include 3D or stylized 2D animated candlestick chart visualizations rendered with Three.js or CSS/SVG. Use static educational content.

Build a Technical Indicators learning module page. Include sections on commonly used indicators: Moving Averages (SMA/EMA), RSI (Relative Strength Index), MACD, Bollinger Bands, and Volume. Each indicator should have a brief explanation, how to read it, and a visual chart mockup rendered using Three.js or SVG. Use static educational content.

Implement a persistent navigation bar that displays the app name/logo and links to each of the four learning modules. The nav should be semi-transparent with a glass-morphism effect to complement the dark 3D aesthetic.

Display module completion progress on the homepage. Show a progress indicator (e.g., a glowing progress ring or bar) for each module card based on the backend completion state. Allow users to mark modules complete from within each module page.

new_feature_requests.summary: 3D interactive website UI/environment for trader education
ICT (Inner Circle Trader) concepts learning module

Implement a backend data store in Motoko that persists progress tracking per module. Store a list of module IDs and a boolean completion status for each. Expose query and update calls to mark a module as completed and retrieve all module completion statuses.
